item.description:
Have you had a spiritual experience? Want to talk about it and how it has changed your life? Or you can listen to the stories of others who have also had spiritual experiences.

Our group is informal, and we like to provide a safe, nurturing environment where you can feel comfortable sharing.

We can explore the more common types of spiritual experiences such as dreams, visions, and feelings of divine love. Or delve into the more unusual ones like Soul Travel.  We also like to share techniques for gaining a greater understanding of your experience, how to ask God/Spirit/life/the Universe a question and how to find an answer.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs in the king's daughter's room

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Spiritual Experiences
